description: This file defines the 'todo-app' web component using LitElement, managing a to-do list with event handling, rendering, and styles.

classes.name: TodoApp
classes.description: Main web component class for the to-do application, extending LitElement, managing state, event handlers, and rendering.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes the TodoApp instance, sets up event listeners.

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description: Lifecycle method called when component is added to DOM; connects the todo list.

methods.name: disconnectedCallback
methods.description: Lifecycle method called when component is removed from DOM; disconnects the todo list.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the HTML template for the to-do app component.

methods.name: #onAddTodo
methods.description: Event handler for adding a new to-do item.

methods.name: #onDeleteTodo
methods.description: Event handler for deleting a to-do item.

methods.name: #onEditTodo
methods.description: Event handler for editing a to-do item.

methods.name: #onToggleAll
methods.description: Event handler for toggling all to-do items.

methods.name: #onClearCompleted
methods.description: Event handler for clearing completed to-do items.
